name: Geo Redirect IPInfo
author: Mohamed AbdElrasoul

sections.description:
Geo Redirect IPInfo is a WordPress plugin that enables you to redirect visitors to different URLs based on their geographical location using IPInfo. This plugin provides a flexible solution for managing visitor redirection according to their country, allowing you to offer a personalized experience for each user based on their location.

The plugin works by determining the visitor’s location using their IP address and then comparing it against the rules you set up in the plugin’s settings. You can create rules to redirect visitors from specific countries to different URLs and set a default URL that will be used if no rules match.

Short Description

Redirect visitors based on their geographical location using IPInfo.

Features

  • Redirects users to different URLs based on their country code.
  • Configurable redirect rules from the WordPress admin settings.
  • Allows setting a default redirect URL if no rules match.
  • Supports IPInfo integration for geolocation data.

Usage

  1. Configure IPInfo Access Token:

    • Go to the plugin settings page and enter your IPInfo Access Token.

  2. Add Redirect Rules:

    • On the plugin settings page, add your redirect rules. Each rule consists of country codes and the corresponding redirect URL.

  3. Set Default Redirect URL:

    • Specify a default redirect URL that will be used if no rules match.

  4. Save Changes:

    • Click ‘Save Changes’ to apply your settings.

Third-Party Service Usage

This plugin relies on the IPInfo service to determine users’ geographical locations based on their IP addresses.

Important Links:

  • IPInfo Service
  • IPInfo Terms of Use
  • IPInfo Privacy Policy

License

This plugin is released under the GPLv2 or later license. See the GPL License for details.

Contact

For support or inquiries, please contact Mohamed AbdElrasoul at mbdalrswl24@gmail.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the geo-redirect-ipinfo directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to ‘Settings’ -> ‘Geo Redirect IPInfo’ to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
How does the plugin determine the user’s location?

The plugin uses IPInfo to get the geographical location based on the user’s IP address.

Can I use other geolocation services?

Currently, the plugin supports IPInfo only.

How can I report bugs or request features?

Please submit your feedback on the plugin’s support forum or contact the plugin author directly.
